descriptions.name: Emails & calendars
text: Answering emails, creating email templates.
Spam filtering
Organization of meetings and negotiations.
Making appointments and maintaining a schedule.
Managing electronic contacts.
Meeting schedule control.

descriptions.name: Document and task management
text: Administration of electronic documents.
Maintaining databases.
Editing and formatting documents.
Creating presentations.
Finding vendors.
Assignment of tasks and control of execution.
Notifications about tasks and their status.
Bill control and payment.

descriptions.name: Curating online schools or courses
text: Help to coordinate and organize the educational process in your online school.
Guiding students from start to finish.
Monitoring and checking homework.
Checking access and connection to the educational platform.
Communication with students: answering questions, motivating and maintaining a friendly atmosphere.

descriptions.name: Camping or Retreat Coordination
text: Location search
Route planning and logistics
Campaign or publicity retreat
Registration and communication with participants to discuss the details
Providing information about the features of the venue
Online consultations on the choice of the necessary equipment
Providing instructions on how to use the equipment
Online control over the route and safety of participants
Gathering feedback from participants
Analysis of the results and identification of possible improvements in the organization.

descriptions.name: Business assistance
text: Competitor analysis & market research.
Optimization of business processes.
Legal consulting & papers.
Business modelling.
Company registration.

descriptions.name: Recruitment & HR
text: Drafting vacancies according to customer requests.
Conducting the first round of interviews.
Search and processing of resumes of applicants.
Calling applicants and conducting the first stage of the interview.
Registration and placement of vacancies on recruiting resources and social networks.
Processing applicants' answers.

descriptions.name: Social media support
text: Content creation: preparing text messages, photos, videos, graphics, etc.
Planning and publishing content: determining the frequency and schedule of publications, planning topics and messages for publication.
Communication: interacting with subscribers, addressing comments and messages, addressing feedback.
Advertising: creating advertising campaigns, defining the audience, setting parameters, tracking results, and optimising.
Help bloggers create subtitles for video content.
Spell check, punctuation and error correction.

descriptions.name: Relocation
text: Assisting with selecting a country to move based on the customer's criteria and preferences.
Selection and organization of housing - help find and rent suitable housing, negotiate with owners, organize property inspections, and draw up a lease agreement.
Selection of schools and kindergartens for children, and assistance with paperwork.
Assistance with job selection and labor market consultation.
Assistance with paperwork, including visas, work permits, and insurance.
Transportation of property and personal belongings to the new location.
Adaptation services: provide information on cultural characteristics, and assistance in finding acquaintances in a new country according to the interests of the customer.
Legal services - provide legal advice on the laws of the new country.

descriptions.name: Travel management
text: Booking tickets: planes, trains, and buses according to the client's preferences.
Booking hotels: searching and booking hotels and other accommodations.
Route planning: developing the optimal travel route, selecting places to visit, booking excursions and entertainment.
Document preparation: registering visas, insurance policies, and other documents.
Consultation: providing information about weather conditions, culture, traditions, and other features of the destination country.
Financial management: monitoring the travel budget, making payments, interacting with banks and financial institutions.
Transfers: organizing transfers between airports, train stations, hotels, and other destinations.
Travel support: resolving problems related to tickets, hotels, transportation, and other services that may arise during the trip.

descriptions.name: Translation
text: Translation of written content from one language to another.
Website translation.
Translation of documents.
Translation of marketing materials.
Translation of audio recordings and video clips.
Overlay of subtitles.

descriptions.name: Content localization
text: Adaptation of content to meet the cultural characteristics and requirements of the target audience.

descriptions.name: Planning and holding conferences and seminars
text: Location selection.
Organization of accommodation and transportation.
Invitation of speakers.
Coordination of all event details.

descriptions.name: Organization of business meetings and events
text: Creation of event programs.
Selection of a venue according to the customer's criteria.
Organization of catering, transportation, and entertainment for participants.

descriptions.name: Organization of corporate holidays and parties
text: Selection of a theme for the party.
Development of a program.
Selection of a venue.
RSVP management.
Organization of catering and entertainment.

descriptions.name: Organizing a date
text: Booking a place at the request of the customer.
Creating a romantic atmosphere (flowers, balloons, candles, etc.)
Horse rides, private jet bookings, hot air balloons and many others.

descriptions.name: Event production and AV services
text: Providing audiovisual services, including lighting, sound, and video production for events.

descriptions.name: Budget management and financial reporting
text: Managing the event budget, tracking expenses, and providing financial reports and analysis to the client.

descriptions.name: Web development
text: development of websites and web applications.
web hosting.

descriptions.name: Web design
text: website design development.
creation of logos and branding.

descriptions.name: Front-end development
text: user interface development.
site optimization for mobile devices.

descriptions.name: Back-end development
text: development of the server part of the site.
database management.

descriptions.name: SEO optimization
text: website content optimization to improve search engine rankings,
keyword research,
technical optimization.

descriptions.name: Coaching
text: Business coaching — goals and performance.
Personal coaching — personal growth, personal goals and increasing motivation.
Technical coaching — motivation in mastering new technologies, improving skills.
Time management coaching — planning and organization.
Coaching in leadership and communication - development of leadership skills, team management and communication.

descriptions.name: Team building
text: Online trainings to improve team performance.
Virtual games and quizzes.
Virtual master classes (culinary/sports/psychological/etc)
Virtual meetings where participants can discuss problems and find solutions together.
